不知道咋样，英文考试时的写作尤其是问题。吐个槽，读原版编程书和文档，it's so easy， 但是当我打开Long Walk To Freedom， 啃去吧，看的太他妈慢了。本来是想从曼德拉那里找到如何坚持和不再迷茫，现在看着这书，我就觉得我很渺茫。

Mongo Morning

I read the book which named MongoDb in Action. So, what i want to say, all below this book and theroy. First time when i know this db, due to YuXian's knowledge tree from KnownSec. I totally appreciate it. Since begining, I read the book what i mentioned before. So, Let's have a quick look.(PS: I have) * Not particularly CPU -intensive
